item.title: Future of the Community
item.description: Future of the Community Community’s Future and Use Cases Overview Future of the Community The “Future of the Community” outlines two significant developments aimed at enhancing collaboration and information sharing within the financial machine learning community: Slack Group: A dedicated Slack group has been established to facilitate real-time communication and community engagement. You can join the group via the following link: Slack Invite. ML-Quant Website: A new website named “ML-Quant” has been launched, serving as a centralized platform for resources, discussions, and updates related to financial machine learning. More details can be explored on the website: ML-Quant.
